CAREER SUMMARY  
 
May 2019 to date Firmenich UAE  
Position: HR Generalist, ME NA 
World’s largest privately owned Fragrance and Taste company. Firmenich ranks no. 
1 worldwide in Fine Fragrance  and Ingredients. With 10,000 employees, presence in 
100+ markets and CHF 3.9bn+ group turnover in FY20.  
 
• Partner with the business ensuring HR proximity, leading transformation and 
people growth  
• Deliver on HR functional excellence, managi ng the full employee cycle and 
ensuring positive employee experience  
• lead recruitment to support the business growth while driving effective 
collaboration with business on talent pipeline  
• Review the Attraction and Recruitment Policy . Build and implem ent Employer 
branding regional strategy  
• Implement the new performance management system focusing on 
performance and behavio ural goals and ongoing feedback  
• Lead Rewards (benchmarking process, benefits review, compensation, 
Annual Salary Review, conduct salary surveys)  
• Inclusive Diversity Champion for the Middle East region, responsible to 
implement Middle East roadmap  
• Implement controversial HR policies (extended ma ternity leave, working from 
home, flexi hours, increased paternity leave and company products to all 
employees).  
    
• Manage the Pulse Survey to drive attraction and engagement  
• Train people managers in recruiting, induction, reward, performance 
management , disciplinary and exit procedures.  
• Create and implement Training Plan at all levels. Launched L&D programs: 
Sales Development Journey, Internal Facilitators, and Executive Coaching.  
• Contribute to the HR Regional Strategy formulation together with th e HR 
Director.  
• Manage the implementation of the 360 Degrees Feedback Survey tool , 
Mentoring Program and Coaching Program, which leads to increased 
performance management and capabilities in the region  
• Design the local Engagement and Wellbeing  annual program  
 
March 2018 to May 2019 Un ion Insurance Company , UAE 
Position: HR Busin ess Partner  
• Own the recruitment and selection process; sourcing, selecting, and 
onboarding employees  
• Lead a team of 2 HR professionals; HRIS Specialist and HR Operations 
Senior Officer  
• Own the revamping of the performance management pro cess & forms and 
deliver trainings to HQ  
• Provide support to managers to retain employees, reduce labor turn over and 
encourage internal promotion (Succession Planning)  
• Assist in strategy development, planning and execution of Positive Employee 
Relati ons initiatives  
• Actively identify HR processes and policies gaps, propose and implement 
changes necessary  
• Design and maintain organization structure as the performance of the 
business unit improves  
• Design and implement diverse HR projects and exer cises; Employer 
Branding, Employee Referral Program, Emiratization, Candidate Experience 
and Employee Engagement  
• Manage and execute monthly payroll process. Develop payroll 
implementation on the HR system  
• Design and manage benefits plan in terms of Corporate Mobile Plans deals, 
Medical Insurance Plans and Benefits, Housing Allowance, Car Allowance, 
Bonus, cost of living Increment etc..  
• Run the performance appraisal exercise biannually and prepare the bon us 
and profit share  
 
July 2016 to March 2017 Valeo  
Position: Recruitment Leader  
A multinational automotive supplier based in France, providing a wide range of 
products to auto manufacturers and after -markets.  
• Partner with stakeholders and develop recruiting strategies meeting current & 
future staffi ng ne

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
